meanings.definition: A shot in basketball made from a position close to the basket, typically using one hand.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he scored an easy layup.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her layup technique every day.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that even a penguin could do a layup.
meanings.sent4: Her layup was as smooth as silk, gliding into the net effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball swishing through the net after his layup was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: The act of laying something up or placing it in a higher position.
meanings.sent1: After the meeting, the layup of documents on the desk was neat.
meanings.sent2: She carefully arranged the books in a layup on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The layup of ingredients on the counter made it look like a cooking show.
meanings.sent4: His layup of tools on the workbench was so organized, it was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The layup of colorful flowers in the vase brightened up the room instantly.
